title: An arrant thiefe, vvhom euery man may trust in vvord and deed, exceeding true and iust. With a comparison betweene a thiefe and a booke. Written by Iohn Taylor.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Edw: All-de, for Henry Gosson, and are to bee solde in Panier-Alley,
